channel.title: How do i change the max Damage on the NPCs? (PI)
channel.description: yeah, i am making a boss that drops a few good items i want it to hit quite high and then alot HP. i already know the HP part but not the damage. please help, thanks

item.title: How do i change the max Damage on the NPCs? (PI)
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Spawn config I think, look for jad and check if it says 970/97(depend if 10x multiplier for hp) if so its on that line for max hit.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the max Damage on the NPCs? (PI)

item.title: How do i change the max Damage on the NPCs? (PI)

item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

If you have the corporal beast added just copy that and change whatever you want.
